Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-2003 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.21-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-2003 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.21-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 14.21-1, affected by CVE-2026-2003
